items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical and Attractive!
items.body: I purchased this zip-up cardigan as a warm sweater to wear while sailing, under a waterproifjacket The pockets are a plus! But it’s also very pretty, lovely soft yarn, fits well, plenty long as it goes to my hips. My favorite go-to sweater. Read more
items.author: Ruby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as pictured
items.body: The sweater is beautiful. True to color, hits at my hip (and I’m over 5’8” tall), and zips easily. Very happy. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent quality
items.body: I'm revising my original score from 5 stars to 3. I was so happy with my sweater at first that I ordered my partner the same sweater in a larger size, and for myself a similar but different one from the same mill, also the next size up. Then within 3 days my first sweater was pilling badly, and now just a few weeks later it looks years old. Plus the light weight zipper is really insufficient for the bulk of the sweater....I have a $15 bathrobe with a heftier more reliable zipper. Then the new sweaters arrived. Both fit a bit smaller in the hips than the first one, even though I ordered a bigger size. Shoulders are bigger though, but I need the room in the hips. My new sweater is a button up, and the buttons are cheap plastic fake leather ones, bleh. The wool is not soft but rather scratchy. On the other hand it's not pilling at all, and generally seems better made (tho I like the fashion details on the first one better). Maybe wools that are very soft just naturally pill more, I don't know. I'm keeping them all because we are having an exceptionally cold winter and these sweaters ARE delightfully toasty warm. I still love the generous length and the colors. But I won't order any more from this company as I don't like the pilling on one and scratchiness of the other. And I'm going to be replacing the zippers very soon. Original review: I will wear it to death. It's cozy warm, falls nicely to mid hip on my 5'8" frame. The "mock turtleneck" is tall but not binding, and when not zipped to the top falls into a nicely shaped collar. I almost dropped one star because I wish the zipper was more substantial. It's a #3, and I would have preferred a #5 zipper just because the bottom feels wimpy where you start the zipper. As a woman with big hips, I know I'll put a lot of stress on it. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new fav
items.body: I love the color feel and heaviness of this sweater. Seems like manufacturing issuing thinner fabrics which defeats the purpose of a warm sweater. But this one is thick and we'll made. Bought a slightly different cut from the same company because I like this one so we'll. Read more
items.author: KJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft fabric! Zipper does not match overall quality
items.body: The quality is superb and the wool is soft and not scratchy; very comfortable. Fit is perfect. Rating is 4.5 - only because a sturdier zipper would be a better match for the rest of the garment (an upgrade for the price). It takes some finesse to use it (the zipper) smoothly as it doesn’t lay flat with the fabric. The zipper pull is heavy, but the zipper is not. I considered returning it because of that, but overall, the sweater feels so good and I prefer a wool sweater like this to be zippered over buttoned. The fabric won me over. The sweater is piling some now that I have worn it several times but is comfortably warm and very enjoyable to wear. I am pleased to have it. Read more
items.author: NE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife loves this sweater.
items.body: I got lucky this time and bought an article of clothing my wife wears often. Read more
items.author: lmelton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars warm
items.body: This is a nice warm sweater that looks good. I marked it down a little because the horizontal pockets look a little saggy, and side ones might look better. Also, the knit is a bit looser than my preference. A tighter knit is less likely to wear at the elbows. Read more
items.author: S. R. Schnur

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Classic Aran White (367), Ssmer.jam, Slate Grey, Irish Sea, Ocean Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
